posts.post_title: FS: T206 Danny Murphy throwing Sweet Caporal 350 Price Cut! sold
posts.post_content:
Selling this Danny Murphy throwing PSA 5 with Sweet Caporal 350/30. Great card with beautiful color and eye appeal. Asking SOLD dlvd. Paypal F/F or Chase Bank Quickpay.
